groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_ReadyWait
groups.text:
Waiting for the other person
to get ready.

groups.label: ExchangeUpper_TxtSetContents_Receive
groups.text:
Select the folder to put the 
received flipnote into, and tap
Receive to get ready.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Disconnect_Report
groups.text:
Disconnected because
the other person quit.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_MemoExchange_Disconnect
groups.text:
Connection will be canceled.

Are you sure?

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_FullFolder
groups.text:
This folder is full of
flipnotes.

Select another folder.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange
groups.text:
Looking for someone
to connect with.

groups.label: ExchangeUpper_TxtSetContents_Send_L
groups.text:
Select a flipnote and tap Send.
Hold the R Button to select
several flipnotes at once.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_ChangeFolder
groups.text:
This folder is full of
flipnotes.

Select another folder.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Exchange_Agreement
groups.text:
Do not send flipnotes that are offensive.
By sending a flipnote, you confirm
that you have obtained all necessary
rights to transmit the images, music, or
other material that may be contained in 
this flipnote. You also agree that unlocked
flipnotes may be edited or posted to the
Internet by the receiver or by a third party.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_PreReceive
groups.text:
Receiving and saving flipnote...
(This may take a while.)

groups.label: ExchangeUpper_TxtSetContents_Send
groups.text:
Select a flipnote and tap Send.
Hold the L Button to select
several flipnotes at once.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Exchange_Top
groups.text:
If you close the system or open 
the HOME Menu during the exchange,
you will be disconnected from the
other user, so please be careful.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_MemoExchange_Agreement
groups.text:
Please read the message
on the upper screen before
using this feature.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Send
groups.text:
Sending flipnote...
(This may take a while.)


groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Receive
groups.text:
Receiving and saving flipnote...
(This may take a while.)


groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_StartWirelessOff
groups.text:
To exchange flipnotes, you must 
enable wireless communication.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Send_InvalidMemo
groups.text:
Stopped sending the flipnote
because the selected flipnote
is corrupted.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_ErrorNothingPartner
groups.text:
Could not find anyone 
to connect with.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Receive_MemoFileCrached
groups.text:
Did not save because
the flipnote received 
was corrupted.
